title: Use a preliminary strategy
text: As there is a greatest common factor, which in this case includes a variable(4u), factor it out. The expression should look like this: $$4u\left(u^2+4u-5\right)$$.
speech: As there is a greatest common factor, which in this case includes a variable(4u), factor it out. The expression should look like this:  4 u parentheses, u squared plus 4 u minus 5  .
pacedSpeech: As there is a greatest common factor, which in this case includes a variable(4u), factor it out. The expression should look like this:   4 u , u squared plus 4 u minus 5

title: Identify
text: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of $$1$$, undo FOIL.
speech: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of  1 , undo FOIL.
pacedSpeech: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of   1

title: Use factors
text: Use the factors of $$5$$ to finish FOIL.
speech: Use the factors of  5  to finish FOIL.

title: Answer
speech: The answer is  4 u, parentheses u minus 1,  times, parentheses u plus 5,  .
pacedSpeech: The answer is   4 u,  u minus 1,  times,  u plus 5,
